category.name: Product Structure.QSearch Configuration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: QS_TRUSHAPE_GENERATION_ENABLED
preference.preference_description: Enables or disables the generation of TruShape data needed by the cacheless spatial search mechanism. This preference is initially set by the Teamcenter Environment Manager (TEM) during installation, according to the cacheless search options selected. Valid Values: true - Enables the generation of TruShape data needed by the cacheless spatial search mechanism. false - Disables the generation of TruShape data needed by the cacheless spatial search mechanism.
